The Columbus Glitchbus is a speedrun marathon hosted live on Twitch.tv, showcasing runners from all around Ohio

If you are interested in running a game for our event that's great! You can use our submission form (Located Here)
The currrent deadline for submissions is April 11th, and we will let you know if you're run has been accepted within a couple days of that!
